short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Applyzap helps you automate your job application process with an autofill extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Applyzap helps find and apply for job applications 80% faster. Simply upload your resume, enter your job preferences, and apply for 100s of open jobs on popular job boards with one click.

Finding your dream has never been easier. Save time and hassle. Use Applyzap's extension to automatically fill in your details and streamline your job application process.

Try for free."
